What's cool about it:

    Includes 4 FREE DLC packages: "New Battlefields", "Conquest", "Commander", and "Fatal Error".
    Wage war on huge maps with large-scale battles, involving hundreds of units ranging from armored tanks, helicopters, infantry, and logistic vehicles.
    In-depth, realistic strategy that takes into account many parameters, such as ammunition, fuel, and supply lines.
    A modern, realistic setting that takes you through an explosive campaign revisiting the Cold War as it could have been if things had heated up.

Overview:

Two sides, eight nations, and one battlefield: Europe!

Set in the rarely explored period of 1975-1985, Wargame: European Escalation pits NATO (USA, Canada, and Western Europe) forces against the Warsaw Pact (the Soviet Union and Eastern European countries) in battles that explore "what could have been". The specter of nuclear warfare loomed large over the real Cold War, but mutually assured destruction (MAD) was the last resort as all knew that the first one to start nuclear hostilities would end up wiped out just the same. In this alternative history of the Cold War, Europe is the core of a war that very well could have been!

Wargame: European Escalation features intense real-time battles, stunning graphics, and the amazing IRISZOOMÃ¢â€žÂ¢ system, giving you a continuous zoom from a global view of the map to the very heart of the action. Realism and strategy are brought to the front lines, are you ready?

Minimum system requirements: Windows XP / Vista / 7, AMD/Intel dual-core 2.5 GHz processor or faster, 2 GB RAM, ATI Radeon X1800 GTO/ Nvidia GeForce 7600 GT or higher with 256 MB VRAM or more (must support DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0), DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card, 10 GB HDD, keyboard, mouse
